Title: Clearly the staff don't work on commission!
Reply: Bonjour Vicky F,C’est avec beaucoup de regrets que je prends connaissance de votre témoignage client. Afin de répondre au mieux à votre demande, je vous prie de me communiquer vos coordonnées en message privé.Par ailleurs, je vous informe que notre service de relation clientèle est joignable au 09 69 39 11 86.Je reste à votre écoute si besoin.Votre conseillère clientèle FLOA Bank.
Experience Date: Clearly the staff don't work on commission!Just awful service. I didn't even get as far as finalising the loan. They continually sent me a contract to sign with the same error - incorrect family name vs maiden name. I explained to them on FIVE different occasions that there was an error yet they kept sending me the exact same contract with the exact same error. In the end I just let it expire. No one even contacted me to check whether I still wanted the loan. Staff were not impolite but just truly some of the most incompetent customer service I have ever experienced.Date of experience: February 28, 2023
